So when I go west from Home theater, the west edge should have the connection between Home theater and the next room. But since I haven't moved yet, the initial graph only has Home theater as a node, and the edges are all empty. Then, after moving west, the next room is added to the nodes, and the west edge gets the connection.

So the first action is to go west. The graph initially has Home theater as a node, and edges are all empty. After moving west, the new room is added, and the west edge of the previous room (Home theater) will have the connection to the new room. Wait, in the example, when they went west from Living Room to Library, the west edge in the graph was [("Living Room", "Library")].
